results.title: Pasteur's experiments
results.creator_credit: Yasuaki Okada, Masaji Hara and Gakken Company
results.brief_description: A puppet film which shows the history of experiments dealing with the spontaneous generation of life. Demonstrates that microbes do not arise spontaneously from meat. Good for showing the experimental method.

results.title: Pasteur
results.brief_description:
A biopic of the famous doctor whose research culminatd with the discovery of a vaccine against rabbies.

Credits: Director, writer, Sacha Guitry ; photography, Jean Bachelet ; music, Louis Beydts.
Cast: Sacha Guitry, Jean Perier, Henry Bonvallet, Gaston Dubosc, Francois Rodon.

results.title: Pasta presto!
results.brief_description: Join Helen Baetz, chef and owner of Pasta Impromptu restaurant, on a guided tour through the delights of pasta. Beginning with how to select pasta, and an introduction to the different types of pasta, Helen then shows how to make fresh pasta, how to cook it and a trio of simple sauces for pasta. Concluding with a recipe for Mexican pasta salad, and a demonstration of how to serve and eat pasta this video is a useful introduction to the world of pasta.

results.title: Past times
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Trevor Lunn and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
results.brief_description: Presented by Rob Gell, this video looks at Australia’s pre-history with reference to creatures living during the Proterozoic and Phanerozoic eons. One of a series produced in conjunction with Youth/ANZAAS.

results.title: Past is prologue: a camera view of a new Norway
results.brief_description: Contrasts the 1100th anniversary of Tonsberg with industry and modern technology. Looks briefly at heavy industry, ship-building, the commissioning of a new oil tanker, and the extent of off-shore drilling. Modern sculpture and space age architecture finish this survey of the new Norway.

results.title: Passiona
results.brief_description: Cathy was a shy, awkward nine year old with a crush on her school teacher, Mr. Wright. Ten years later, as an attractive nineteen year old, Cathy meets him again at her cousin’s birthday party. He develops an interest in her and her memories of him are stirred. Through her romantic childhood eyes, she relives school days. As the night progresses, however, she faces the reality of her teacher and the deceptions wrought by both passion and memory.
